Authors:
Alexandre Gonçalves dos Santos Silva-Filho, Mariana Sá,
Dirce Leimi Komura, Felipe Wartchow
Title:
Two novel species of Lactifluus subg. Pseudogymnocarpi
(Russulales) from Brazil
Keywords:
Agaricomycetes, milkcaps, Neotropic, new taxa, phylogeny,
rDNA ITS, Russulaceae
Abstract:
Two new Lactifluus, Lactifluus umbilicatus and Lf.
venosellus were collected from Amazonian Forest and Atlantic Forest of
Brazil, respectively. These two taxa, belongs to subg. Pseudogymnocarpi
and were described based on detailed macro- and micromorphological
observations along with nrITS-based phylogenetic analysis. Detailed
descriptions and illustrations, of the new species are provided, as well
as the comparisons with related taxa.
